entry.title: tmux-powerline
entry.content:
install tmux-powerline

Tmux status bar gets to show me

  • lan ip
  • wan ip
  • windows/panes
  • load
  • battery status
  • weather/temperature
  • date

http://github.com/ompugao/tmux-powerline

Great!

entry.title: tmux setting
entry.content:
type your password only once

Add the following function to .zshrc.

function savepasswd(){
    local password
    echo -n "password:"
    read -s password ; echo
    tmux bind-key y send-keys "$password"
}

Then,call the function and save your password.

And then, type: C-<your tmux prefix> y.
